title: As a support main I think Evelynn needs some serious help, perhaps a stun?
body: Yes, a stun added to her E maybe? Like 1.6 seconds at rank 1 and 2 seconds at rank 5?

replies.body:
>As a support main

What does this have to do with Eve? Lol.

> [{quoted}](name=Sukishoo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BNYhJn3Q,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-06T19:17:29.975+0000)
>
> What does this have to do with Eve? Lol.

Even a support main like me can see how weak she is.
Nope, she needs a new ultimate.
_eve_ and _support_ shouldn't even be in the same sentence.
